name: Frequently Asked Questions - Accent Prime Facial Radiofrequency

mainEntity.name: What is facial radiofrequency and how does it act on the skin?

acceptedAnswer.text: Facial radiofrequency is a non-invasive aesthetic treatment that uses electromagnetic waves to heat the deep layers of the skin. This stimulates the production of collagen and elastin, progressively improving skin firmness and elasticity.

acceptedAnswer.text:
Facial radiofrequency with Accent Prime is effective for:

âœ… Fine wrinkles: Smooths expression lines without the need for injections.
âœ… Dark circles and bags: Reduces fluid retention and improves microcirculation.
âœ… Dull or aged skin: Provides luminosity and a natural lifting effect.

mainEntity.name: How many sessions are needed to see results?

acceptedAnswer.text: The number of sessions varies according to age and skin condition. Generally, **4 to 6 sessions** are recommended, with a frequency of one every 15 days. Results begin to be noticed from the first session and are enhanced over time.

mainEntity.name: How long do the results of facial radiofrequency last?

acceptedAnswer.text: Effects can last between **6 and 12 months**, depending on skin type and aftercare. It is recommended to perform maintenance sessions every 4 to 6 months to prolong benefits.

mainEntity.name: Is the Accent Prime treatment painful?

acceptedAnswer.text:
No, the treatment is painless and generates only a sensation of moderate heat on the skin.
Accent Prime has a cooling system that protects the epidermis, ensuring a comfortable and safe experience.

mainEntity.name: Is facial radiofrequency an alternative to surgical facelift?

acceptedAnswer.text:
It does not replace a surgical facelift in cases of severe laxity, but it is an excellent option for those seeking to improve skin firmness without surgery.
Accent Prime allows a natural tensor effect without the need for recovery times.
